entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.1°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. Rain beginning overnight. Wind west 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 05 February 2023
